title: [Client] Skins reseting every game
body:
I don't believe its affecting all champions but the skins you select in one game won't stay selected for the next game.

This is this way for Koi Nami {{champion:267}} and I talked to some one who said they had the same issue with Royal Guard Fiora {{champion:114}} .

replies.body:
Hey Xicashina,

Was this occurring with the new champion select in both cases?

This has happened to me as well, only with new champion select.
Some curious things I've noticed about it.

Champions that I have previously played with a skin before the new champ select, showed up with the skins in new champ select. For example, I always use Officer Vi and did so _before_ new champ select was released, in new champ select Vi pops up with Officer showing 1st.

Champions that I have not played with a skin before the new champ select, keep reverting to classic skin. For example, I bought Koi Nami _after_ the new champ select was released, in new champ select Nami pops up with classic showing 1st.

I'm talking out of my ass now, but it's almost as though playing the old champ select with the skin 'locked it in' for future games, but the new champion select doesn't do this. It just goes with whatever skin I last used in the old champ select, be it Officer Vi, Safari Caitlyn or Classic Nami.

EDIT: I can't actually test this any further while the new champ select is down. I have since played a few games of Koi Nami with old champ select, but don't know what effect that might have had. 
I should mention I don't have a great sample size, I play a pretty limited champion pool and already have most of the skins I want. Koi Nami is the only champion/skin I've noticed this with and is the only skin I've bought after new champ select was released.
Thanks so much for the additional context here!

Minor update.
I played a normal draft, swapping from Classic to Koi Nami.
Just played another normal draft, but this time Koi Nami showed 1st.

Yes: It was in the same game too

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2073205756/227656592?tab=overview

Its happened to me in previous games though
I've noticed this too. New Champion Select just doesn't seem to be able to save what skin I used last game.
